mean_cn: v. 分开，隔离，进行种族隔离
mean_en: to separate people of different races, religions or sexes and treat them in a different way; to keep one thing separate from another
sentence: The police segregated the two rival camps of protesters.
sentence_trans: 警察把两个对立的抗议者阵营隔离开来。
word_etyma: se分开，离开，区别开 + greg群 + ate动词后缀 → 和人群分开 → 隔离
